call.from sentence: We present a new task and dataset , which we call NarrativeQA , which will test and reward artificial agents approaching this level of competence ( Section 3 ) .

stories.from sentence: The dataset consists of stories , which are books and movie scripts , with human written questions and answers based solely on human - generated abstractive summaries .

questions.from sentence: For the RC tasks , questions maybe answered using just the summaries or the full story text .
